topic.title: We have to make ZeroTalk a multi-language board
topic.body:
I think we have to set zerotalk as a official multi-language board and make English-only board for English speakers. 

Here is the front page. Reddit or 4chan(at least /int/) do not prohibit its users to make threads in their native language. Why should we do that?

4_17ffrcHNzbFoUe81PyMEagQdv2DGNRLFcE.body: btw, Will this webzite support subtitle/embed features? I'm waiting for it

> [realkittykate](#comment_37_17H8EGEoNF1z2AXFtXmBQJLHTmh7gMGzzS): I don't think SRT files work with HTML5.. but apparently there are some SRT > VTT converters.

Except it does? HTML5 perfectly supports SRT.

12_13aB79mzuRLgDYzQthn9wzycjw77WyDXh6.body: Do you know at least a half of zeronet users are Chinese and Google is blocked in China?

> [polar](#comment_58_13aB79mzuRLgDYzQthn9wzycjw77WyDXh6): https://zeronet.io also be blocked by GFW. Ask government, not me.

Except you don't have to download/access zeronet via zeronet.io

>Ask government, not me.

You're just being irresponsible.

1513362859_15zSEBpmS1CwXsJjDA5ymFXtoGpsn.body:
https://my.mixtape.moe/uydxds.png

Reported this thread to FBI. 

Good luck with your life in prison, OP.
